mapper.insert: insert into waybill (w_id, w_status, w_info, c_id, w_note, w_weight, w_price, w_type, s_inid, w_intime, w_intype, s_outid, w_outtime, w_outproof, w_sname, w_sphone, w_spro, w_scity, w_scounty, w_saddress, w_rname, w_rphone, w_rpro, w_rcity, w_rcounty, w_raddress) values (#{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wIntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wIntype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sOutid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wOuttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wOutproof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wSname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wSphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wSpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wScity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wScounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wSaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wRphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wRpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wRcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wRcounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wRaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update waybill set w_status = #{wStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_info = #{wInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, w_note = #{wNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_weight = #{wWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, w_price = #{wPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, w_type = #{wType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_inid = #{sInid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, w_intime = #{wIntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, w_intype = #{wIntype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_outid = #{sOutid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, w_outtime = #{wOuttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, w_outproof = #{wOutproof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_sname = #{wSname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_sphone = #{wSphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, w_spro = #{wSpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_scity = #{wScity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_scounty = #{wScounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_saddress = #{wSaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_rname = #{wRname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_rphone = #{wRphone,jdbcType=CHAR}, w_rpro = #{wRpro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_rcity = #{wRcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_rcounty = #{wRcounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_raddress = #{wRaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select w_id, w_status, w_info, c_id, w_note, w_weight, w_price, w_type, s_inid, w_intime, w_intype, s_outid, w_outtime, w_outproof, w_sname, w_sphone, w_spro, w_scity, w_scounty, w_saddress, w_rname, w_rphone, w_rpro, w_rcity, w_rcounty, w_raddress from waybill where w_id = #{wId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select w_id, w_status, w_info, c_id, w_note, w_weight, w_price, w_type, s_inid, w_intime, w_intype, s_outid, w_outtime, w_outproof, w_sname, w_sphone, w_spro, w_scity, w_scounty, w_saddress, w_rname, w_rphone, w_rpro, w_rcity, w_rcounty, w_raddress from waybill

select * from waybill
w_status like concat('%',#{wStatus},'%')
and w_id like concat('%',#{wId},'%')
and w_sphone like concat('%',#{wSphone},'%')
and w_rphone like concat('%',#{wRphone},'%')

select count(*) from waybill
w_status like concat('%',#{wStatus},'%')
and w_id like concat('%',#{wId},'%')
and w_sphone like concat('%',#{wSphone},'%')
and w_rphone like concat('%',#{wRphone},'%')
